top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
This has dramatically improved my shower experience, now I dont have to use the garden hose anymore.
Alternatively, remove the head and clean it
Or, if it’s a mineral build up, put white vinegar in a baggie, rubberband the bag over the tap or showerhead, and leave it to soak for a few hours.
If just some of the holes are blocked, then it would actually increase your water pressure, not decrease it.
